creditline: Gift of Barbara M. Kaerwer in honor of John E. Andrus III on his 100th birthday
description: painterly-style portrait of a man with a short white beard and short white hair against a black ground
medium: Maniere noire lithograph on chine appliqué
provenance: (Didier Martinez, Paris); Private collection, Chicago, 2007-08; (Armstrong Fine Art, Chicago, 2008-09, sold to Kaerwer); Barbara M. Kaerwer, Eden Prairie, Minn.; given to MIA ,2009.
signed: Signed LRC of image, in the stone, and LLC in margin, in pencil: Eugène Carrière
title: Puvis de Chavannes (Second plate)
